title: If League of Legends Go was a thing...
body: Who would you main, assuming you had to use your own body to input movement commands and perform your basic attacks (anything not related to abilities)?

replies.body: {{champion:41}} cause I get to act like a fucking pirate
{{champion:266}} time for some real exercise as I solo this baron.

Sion. I would un-ashamedly charge through public places with my phone shouting "COWAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARDS!!!" at the top of my lungs if this were a thing.

https://media.giphy.com/media/3o7TKEfh5U6CYsE9dS/giphy.gif

Hmm...

Either Shaco

Or

Maybe Ryze, since if I'm commanding everything through me, I could deal out some hell

Oooh yeah never thought of that

Master Yi though

He alpha's, I flux him, Root him, Blast him with Q, then he attacks again with my shield up, I can Root him again, Flux him, then use the Bonus damage from Q to melt his face...

Plus Teleporting me, my friends and all my stuff would be epic

I'd be faker and main Vayne.


[(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Em1pqSOcBLQ)]

reference for uneducated plebs
